title: March: 1949
description: John Ford and John Wayne are back with a road-trip selection from their Calvalry Trilogy.

title: February: 1939
description:
This month we travel to perhaps the greatest year of cinema, 1939 -- we're 
not in Kansas anymore, we're in the Golden Age of Hollywood! And we're off 
to see a wizard on a yellow brick road-trip.

title: January: 1929
description:
This is our first month of time-travel movies! For January, we'll be traveling 
to 1929 to pick the first film in our year-long theme "Road Trip". We'll be 
looking at an experimental Soviet film that questions what cinema should be
and helps us question our theme.

title: Introduction
description:
Welcome! This post provides an introduction to the Time Travel Movie 
Club - what it is and where we'll be going. Ten decades of film, viewed 
at 12fpy ("films per year"). It also announces our theme of the year for 2019.
